legends.name: Ash
legends.summaryOne: Throw a spinning snare that damages and tethers the first enemy who gets too close.
legends.summaryTwo: Ash's map shows the location of recent deathboxes and marks surviving attackers.
legends.summaryThree: Tear open a one-way portal to a targeted location.

legends.name: Bangalore
legends.summaryOne: Fire a high-velocity smoke canister that explodes into a smoke wall on impact.
legends.summaryTwo: Taking fire while sprinting makes you move faster for a brief time.
legends.summaryThree: Call in an artillery strike that slowly creeps across the landscape.

legends.name: Bloodhound
legends.summaryOne: Briefly reveal hidden enemies, traps, and clues throughout structures in front of you.
legends.summaryTwo: See tracks left behind by your foes.
legends.summaryThree: Enhances your senses, allowing you to move faster and highlighting your prey.

legends.name: Caustic
legends.summaryOne: Drop canisters that release deadly Nox gas when shot or triggered by enemies.
legends.summaryTwo: Allows you to see enemies through your gas.
legends.summaryThree: Blankets a large area in Nox gas.

legends.name: Crypto
legends.summaryOne: Deploy an aerial drone that allows you to view the surrounding area from above.
legends.summaryTwo: Enemies detected by the Surveillance Drone within 30 meters of your pisition are marked for you and your teammates to see.
legends.summaryThree: Your Surveillance Drone sets off an EMP blast that deals shield damage, slows enemies and disables traps.

legends.name: Fuse
legends.summaryOne: Launch a cluster bomb that continuously expels airburst explosives on impact.
legends.summaryTwo: Stack an extra grenade per inventory slot. Fire grenades farther, faster, and more accurately.
legends.summaryThree: Launch a bombardmnt that encircles a target area in a wall of flame.

legends.name: Gibraltar
legends.summaryOne: Throw down a dome shield that blocks attacks.
legends.summaryTwo: Aiming down sights deploys a gun shield that blocks incoming fire.
legends.summaryThree: Call in a concentrated mortar strike on a marked position.

legends.name: Horizon
legends.summaryOne: Reverses the flow of gravity, lifting players upwards and bossting them outwards when they exit.
legends.summaryTwo: Increase air control and reduce fall impacts with Horizon's custom spacesuit .
legends.summaryThree: Deploy N.E.W.T to create a micro black hole that pulls players in towards it, and hits them with a gravitational blast at the end.

legends.name: Lifeline
legends.summaryOne: Call you Drone of Compassion to automatically heal nearby teammates over time.
legends.summaryTwo: Deploy D.O.C to revive temmates, leaving you free to move and defend.
legends.summaryThree: Call in a drop pod full of high-quality defensive gear.

legends.name: Loba
legends.summaryOne: Teleport to hard-to-reach places or escape trouble quickly by throwing your Jump Drive bracelet.
legends.summaryTwo: Nearby epic and legendary loot can be seen through walls. The range is the same as Black Market Boutique.
legends.summaryThree: Place a portable device that allows you to teleport nearby loot to your inventory.

legends.name: Mad Maggie
legends.summaryOne: Fire a drill that burns enemies through obstacles.
legends.summaryTwo: Temporarily highlight enemies you've damages, and move faster with a shotgun.
legends.summaryThree: Throw a ball that releases speed-boosting pads and detonates near enemies.

legends.name: Mirage
legends.summaryOne: Send out a holographic decoy to confuse the enemy.
legends.summaryTwo: Automatically cloak when using Respawn Beacons and reviving teammates.
legends.summaryThree: Deploy a team of Decoys to distract enemies.

legends.name: Octane
legends.summaryOne: Move 30% faster for six seconds. Costs health to use.
legends.summaryThree: Deploy a jump pad that catapults teammates through the air.
